properties.entry: SELECT RNUM, INGRD_CODE , INGRD_NAME FROM( SELECT ROWNUM RNUM, A.* FROM( SELECT INGRD_CODE , INGRD_NAME FROM INGRD WHERE INGRD_NAME LIKE '%'||?||'%' ORDER BY TO_NUMBER(SUBSTR(INGRD_CODE,2)) )A ) WHERE RNUM BETWEEN ? AND ?
SELECT COUNT(*) COUNT FROM INGRD WHERE INGRD_NAME LIKE '%'||?||'%'
DELETE FROM INGRD WHERE INGRD_CODE LIKE ?
SELECT I.INGRD_NAME, I.INGRD_CODE FROM INGRD I JOIN RECIPE_INGRD RI ON(I.INGRD_CODE = RI.INGRD_CODE) WHERE I.INGRD_CODE = ?
SELECT COUNT(*) COUNT FROM INGRD WHERE INGRD_NAME LIKE ?
INSERT INTO INGRD VALUES( (SELECT 'I'||(MAX(TO_NUMBER(SUBSTR(INGRD_CODE,2)))+1) FROM INGRD ) ,? )

SELECT RNUM, DOSE_CODE , DOSE_NAME FROM( SELECT ROWNUM RNUM, A.* FROM( SELECT DOSE_CODE, DOSE_NAME FROM DOSE_UNIT WHERE DOSE_NAME LIKE '%'||?||'%' ORDER BY TO_NUMBER(SUBSTR(DOSE_CODE,2)) )A ) WHERE RNUM BETWEEN ? AND ?
SELECT COUNT(*) COUNT FROM DOSE_UNIT WHERE DOSE_NAME LIKE '%'||?||'%'
SELECT COUNT(*) COUNT FROM DOSE_UNIT WHERE DOSE_NAME LIKE ?
INSERT INTO DOSE_UNIT VALUES( (SELECT 'U'||(MAX(TO_NUMBER(SUBSTR(DOSE_CODE,2)))+1) FROM DOSE_UNIT ) ,? )
DELETE FROM DOSE_UNIT WHERE DOSE_CODE LIKE ?
SELECT D.DOSE_NAME, D.DOSE_CODE FROM DOSE_UNIT D JOIN RECIPE_INGRD RI ON(RI.DOSE_CODE = D.DOSE_CODE) WHERE D.DOSE_CODE LIKE ?
